Content: Police have found the 8th month old infant abducted recently from Vavuniya. The infant was abducted from Good Shed area in Vavuniya. The mother of the child said that she suspected her husband was linked with the abduction. Following investigations Police found the child from Pudukudi-irippu area. Two suspects who were looking after the child were arrested by the Police. The child who was brought to Vavuniya police station, was handed over to the mother.
